ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheFalc.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally targets an enemy or point you can see with a Geomancer or Pyrokinetic skill. The reaction deals earth or fire damage, respectively.

ACT_Predator_Ascension_Force_TheFalcon_N.Description: Predator reactions can be performed, once per round, when an enemy you can see reaches Battered or Harried 7 (or higher).

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheFal.Description: Earth and fire Elementalist reactions apply Calcifying and Scorched for 2 turns, respectively.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Force_TheFalcon_.Description: Predator reactions apply up to Slowed II for 2 turns.

ACT_Paucity_Ascension_Force_TheHatchet_N.Description: Paucity activates when you reach Battered or Harried 7 and above.

ACT_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheHat.Description: Activate Violent Strike when you reach 0 AP.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Force_TheHatchet_.Description: Paucity reduces the penalty of dodge fatigue by 5%.

MUTA_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheHa.Description: Violent Strike applies Acid for 2 turns.
Violent Strike applies Bleeding for 2 turns.
Violent Strike applies Suffocating for 2 turns.
Violent Strike applies up to Terrified II for 1 turn.

ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheArca.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally performs a Predator reaction or applies Vulnerable III. The reaction deals fire or earth damage, respectively.

ACT_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheArc.Description: Violent Strike activates when you reach 2 or more stacks of Elementalist.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheArc.Description: Source Infusion 1: if you have 3 stacks of Elementalist or more when you perform your next Elementalist reaction, emulate the effects of Dazing Bolt, Fireball, Impalement, or Winter Blast with air, fire, water, and earth reactions, respectively.
Gain +5% Finesse and Power per stack of Elementalist.

MUTA_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheAr.Description: Violent Strike deals an additional +5% damage for every two Entropy, Force, or Life, up to 100%.

ACT_Paucity_Ascension_Force_TheArcher_No.Description: Paucity activates when you reach Battered or Harried 7 and above.

ACT_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheArc.Description: Once per round, per target, Violent Strike activates when you deal damage to an enemy exceeding 20% of their total Vitality over a turn.

ACT_Paucity_Ascension_Force_TheArcher_No.Description: Once per round, activate Paucity for 1 turn when your Physical or Magic Armor is damaged to zero.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Force_TheArcher_N.Description: Paucity grants: +10% Accuracy, +20% damage, and +10 Initiative.

MUTA_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheAr.Description: When you perform a Violent Strike, gain Elemental Arrowheads for 1 turn, matching the surface your target is standing in.
Violent Strike applies +1 Battered and Harried to its primary target.

ACT_Paucity_Ascension_Force_TheManticore.Description: Once per round, when you drop to 25% Vitality or below, activate Paucity.

ACT_Predator_Ascension_Force_TheManticor.Description: Predator reactions can be performed when an ally applies Terrified to an enemy you can see.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Force_TheManticor.Description: If you have Paucity active at the end of your turn, emulate the effects of Black Shroud on the nearest enemy you can see within 13m.
If you activate Paucity when you have a dagger equipped, sneak and become invisible until the start of your next turn.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Force_TheMantico.Description: Source Infusion 1: your next Predator reaction emulates the effects of Fan of Knives.

ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheScor.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally targets an enemy or point you can see with a Geomancer or Pyrokinetic skill. The reaction deals earth or fire damage, respectively.

ACT_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Force_TheScor.Description: Once per round, per target, activate Vitality Void after dealing total damage, to a non-summon enemy, exceeding 30% of their total Vitality over a turn.

ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheScor.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally directly targets an enemy you can see with a Necromancer or Scoundrel skill. The reaction deals water or air damage, respectively.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheSco.Description: Gain +5% critical chance per stack of Elementalist.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Force_TheSco.Description: Your Vitality Void applies Acid, Calcifying, and Suffocating for 1 turn.

ACT_Predator_Ascension_Force_TheTiger_No.Description: Predator reactions can be performed when an ally applies Dazzled to an enemy you can see.

ACT_Purity_Ascension_Force_TheTiger_Node.Description:
When reduced to 30% Vitality (+1.5% per Life) or below, activate Purity.

+0.6 Movement Speed.
Once per round, activate Purity when a non-summon enemy dies.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Force_TheTiger_N.Description: When you have two weapons equipped, your Predator reaction range becomes 10m, unless already higher.
Predator reactions apply Bleeding for 2 turns; if the target already has Bleeding, also apply Hemorrhage for 2 turns, which behaves identically to Bleeding.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Force_TheTiger_Nod.Description: Purity aura grants: +10% Accuracy, +15% Damage, and +15% Vitality restored from Voracity.

ACT_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheCon.Description: During your turn, You have a 15% chance (+3% per Force) as you hit an enemy to activate Violent Strike.

MUTA_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheCo.Description: Violent Strike gains +5% damage for every 5 Finesse or Strength over 10, whichever is higher, up to 100%.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Force_TheConqueror.Description: When you activate Purity, extend the duration of Source generation by 1. When a non-summon enemy dies, if Purity has remaining cooldown, reduce its remaining cooldown by 1.

MUTA_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Force_TheCo.Description: When you perform a Violent Strike, activate Vitality Void.

ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheKrak.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally performs an Elementalist or Occultist reaction. The reaction deals fire or water damage, respectively.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheKra.Description: If you have a free off hand and 1 stack or more of Elementalist, your Elementalist reactions targeting enemies count as basic attacks.
Gain +10% damage from Power per stack of Elementalist.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Force_TheKra.Description: Once per round when you activate Vitality Void, teleport each non-boss enemy with Withered within 6m to a position nearest you where they can stand.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Force_TheKra.Description: Elementalist reactions apply statuses (based on their element) for 2 turns to characters hit, dealing damage each turn.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Force_TheKra.Description: When you activate Vitality Void, emulate the effects of Glaciate.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Force_Wrath_Node_.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants +10% Accuracy and Critical Chance.

ACT_Paucity_Ascension_Force_Wrath_Node_2.Description: Activate Paucity when you gain the Berserk status.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Force_Wrath_.Description: If you have Paucity active and a two handed weapon equipped, Vitality Void deals additional damage equal to 1% of your total Vitality per Force.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Force_Wrath_Node_.Description: If you have Paucity Active, apply Withered for 1 turn to enemies hit while performing a basic attack.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Force_Wrath_Node.Description: Predator reactions gain +5% damage and +3% Lifesteal per Force.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Force_Wrath_Node_.Description: If you have Paucity, your Assassinate, Fireball, Impalement, Onslaught, and Terrifying Cruelty skills are performed at +1 effective Source Infusion, even if uninfused.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Force_Wrath_Node.Description: Source Infusion 1: when you perform a Predator reaction, emulate the effects of Horrid Wilting.

ACT_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_TheFl.Description: For each Source Point you spend in combat, activate Vitality Void.

ACT_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_TheFly_Node.Description:
Apply Withered for 2 turns when you apply tier II or III of Slowed or Weakened to an enemy.

+1 Power.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_TheF.Description: Vitality Void applies up to Terrified II for 1 turn.

MUTA_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_TheFly_Nod.Description:
When you critically strike an enemy afflicted with Withered, apply up to Subjugated II for 2 turns.

+4% Damage.

ACT_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_TheVultu.Description: Occultist reactions can be performed when an ally applies tier II or III of Subjugated or Terrified to an enemy you can see.

ACT_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_TheVultur.Description: Predator reactions can be performed when an ally perfoms an Attack of Opportunity on an enemy you can see.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_TheVult.Description: Occultist reactions also apply up to Weakened II for 2 turns.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_TheVultu.Description: While performing a Predator reaction, gain +1.5% Critical Strike per percent of target's missing Vitality, up to a maximum of +50%.

ACT_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_Blood.Description: Once per turn, when damage from an enemy causes you to drop to 35% Vitality or below, activate Vitality Void.

ACT_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_BloodApe_No.Description: When you apply Bleeding to an enemy, apply Withered for 1 turn.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_Bloo.Description: Once per round, when Vitality Void hits 3 or more targets, extend your Source Generation by 1 turn.

MUTA_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_BloodApe_N.Description: Source Infusion 1, Pay 20% of your total Vitality: when you perform a basic attack on an enemy with Withered, also emulate the effects of Grasp of the Starved.

ACT_IncarnateChampion_Ascension_Entropy_.Description: Conjure Incarnate summons an Incarnate Champion.

ACT_Paucity_Ascension_Entropy_Extinction.Description: Paucity activates when three or more of your allies, including totems or summons, die in a single round.

ACT_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_Extinctio.Description: At the end of your turn, perform a Predator reaction on the nearest enemy you can see within 3m of a corpse.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Entropy_Extinctio.Description: Paucity activates for your summons whenever it activates for you. Paucity grants: +10% Accuracy, +10% damage, and +10 Initiative.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_Extincti.Description: If you know Summon Boneshaped Skitterer, Predator reactions no longer perform a basic attack, and instead summon a Boneshaped Skitterer adjacent to the target. For this effect, your Predator reaction range becomes 13m, unless already higher.
While performing a Predator reaction, gain +20% damage per corpse you can see, up to a maximum of 100%.

ACT_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_TheImp_N.Description: Occultist reactions can be performed when an ally applies Wither to an enemy you can see; once per enemy, per round.

ACT_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_TheImp_Node.Description: Apply Withered for 2 turns when you afflict an enemy with Subjugated or Terrified.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_TheImp_.Description: Occultist reactions count as basic attacks.

MUTA_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_TheImp_Nod.Description: Withered applies up to Vulnerable II for 2 turns.
If you have 4 or more stacks of Adaptation when you perform a basic attack on an enemy with Withered, lose 1 stack of Adaptation and emulate the effects of Vampiric Touch.

ACT_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_TheHyena_.Description: Once per round, Predator reactions can be performed when an ally perfoms a Predator reaction on an enemy you can see.

ACT_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_TheHy.Description: For each Source Point you spend in combat, activate Vitality Void.
Vitality Void also activates whenever you suffer a tier III status.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_TheHyena.Description: Predator reactions activate Voracity at 50% effectiveness.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_TheH.Description: Vitality Void applies up to Subjugated II and Terrified II for 1 turn.
Vitality Void deals additional damage, equivalent to 3% of your maximum Vitality per enemy it hits.

ACT_Adaptation_Ascension_Entropy_TheSupp.Description:
Learn the Adaptation skill.

Adaptation activates, granting 2 stacks, when an enemy kills an ally.

ACT_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_TheSuppl.Description: Once per round, Occultist reactions can be performed when an enemy you can see kills an allied summon.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Entropy_TheSup.Description: Adaptation grants +2% invested Power and +1% Lifesteal.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_TheSupp.Description: Occultist reactions summon a totem adjacent to the target.
If you have 7 or more stacks of Adaptation when you perform an Occultist reaction, lose 2 stacks of Adaptation and emulate the effects of Infect.

ACT_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_Death_Nod.Description: Predator reactions can be performed when an ally performs a Violent Strike on an enemy you can see.

ACT_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_Death.Description: Vitality Void activates when a non-summon character dies while in combat with you.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_Death_No.Description: Predator reactions gain +20% Accuracy, and recover 2 AP when an enemy dies during the reaction.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_Deat.Description: Vitality Void applies Withered for 1 turn. +1m Vitality Void radius.

MUTA_Predator_Ascension_Entropy_Death_No.Description: Predator reactions gain +20% Critical Chance. If an enemy dies and leaves a viable corpse during the reaction, create a Bloated Corpse (as per Raise Bloated Corpse) from its corpse.

MUTA_VitalityVoid_Ascension_Entropy_Deat.Description: Vitality Void summons a Boneshaped Skitterer on up to 2 corpses within 5m.

ACT_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_Decay_Node_.Description: When you or your summons explode a corpse, apply Withered for 2 turns to enemies within 3m of the corpse.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Entropy_Decay_Nod.Description: Paucity grants +2.5% Power and Wits per Entropy, Force, and Form.

MUTA_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_Decay_Node.Description: Withered applies -2.5% accuracy per Entropy, Force, and Form.

MUTA_Paucity_Ascension_Entropy_Decay_Nod.Description: Paucity grants a 13m aura that applies -1% Accuracy and -1.5% Movement Speed per Leadership to enemies.

MUTA_Wither_Ascension_Entropy_Decay_Node.Description: Withered applies Corroding for 1 turn to enemies within 2m of its target. Withered applies -10% Constitution (-1% per Entropy, Force, and Form).

ACT_Adaptation_Ascension_Entropy_Demilic.Description: Adaptation activates when your Paucity would activate, instead of Paucity.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Entropy_Demili.Description: If you have 5 or more stacks of Adaptation when you cast Grasp of the Starved, Hail Strike, or Mosquito Swarm, lose 3 stacks of Adaptation to gain +1 effective Source Infusion, even if normally uninfused.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_Demilic.Description: Bane also counts preexisting Battered and Harried stacks on the target for determining its final detonation damage.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Entropy_Demili.Description: If you have 5 or more stacks of Adaptation when you cast Blizzard, Scourge, or Winter Blast, lose 3 stacks of Adaptation to gain +1 effective Source Infusion even if normally uninfused.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Entropy_Demilic.Description:
When you perform an Occultist reaction, gain 2 stacks of Adaptation.

-1 Bane duration.

ACT_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_TheChalice_N.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Abeyance.

+1 Strength.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_TheChalice_.Description: When Abeyance activates, remove all tier I and II statuses from yourself.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_TheChalic.Description: Adaptation grants +2% to elemental resistances per stack of Adaptation.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Form_TheKey_Node.Description: Centurion reactions can be performed when an enemy you can see misses you.

ACT_Occultist_Ascension_Form_TheKey_Node.Description: Occultist reactions can be performed when an ally applies tier II or III of Ataxia or Squelched to an enemy you can see.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Form_TheKey_Nod.Description: Occultist reactions also apply Calcifying for 2 turns.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Form_TheNautilus_.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants +6% physical resistance.

MUTA_Presence_Ascension_Form_TheSilkworm.Description: Presence grants +2% to elemental resistances per Leadership. If you already have this effect: Presence grants +1% damage per Leadership.

ACT_Occultist_Ascension_Form_TheBasilisk.Description: If you have a free off hand at the end of your turn, perform an Occultist reaction on the nearest non-totem enemy you can see.

ACT_Wither_Ascension_Form_TheBasilisk_No.Description: When you apply Calcifying to an enemy, apply Withered for 1 turn.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Form_TheBasilis.Description: Source Infusion 1: when you perform an Occultist reaction, emulate the effects of Petrifying Visage.
Occultist reactions apply up to Slowed II for 2 turns.

MUTA_Wither_Ascension_Form_TheBasilisk_N.Description: Withered applies -5% movement (-1.5% per Form and Entropy).

ACT_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_Doppelgang.Description:
Learn the Adaptation skill.

Adaptation activates, granting 3 stacks, when you cast any Incarnate infusion.

ACT_Occultist_Ascension_Form_Doppelgange.Description: Once per round, Occultist reactions can be performed when an enemy you can see kills an allied summon.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_Doppelgan.Description: Adaptation grants +2% missing Vitality, Physical, and Magic Armor regeneration.

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Form_Doppelgang.Description: If you have 6 or more stacks of Adaptation when you perform an Occultist reaction, lose 1 stack of Adaptation and emulate the effects of Throw Dust.

ACT_IncarnateChampion_Ascension_Form_Dop.Description: Conjure Incarnate summons an Incarnate Champion.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Form_TheDragon_No.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

If you already have this activator: activate Defiance at the start of your turn if you have 3 or more non-totem allies within 5m of you. Defiance grants +15% damage.

ACT_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_TheDragon_No.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Abeyance.

-0.2% Abeyance activation threshold per Power and Wits over 10.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Form_TheDragon_N.Description: Centurion activates on enemies targeted by allied Predator reactions.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Form_TheDragon_No.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants +10 initiative and +2 free Centurion reactions.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_TheDragon_N.Description: If you have 5 or more stacks of Adaptation when you activate Abeyance, pay 1 stack of Adaptation for each enemy you can see within 8m to deal fire damage to it.
When Abeyance activates due to an enemy, and you control totems who can see this enemy, you order these totems to retaliate instead of abeying the damage.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Form_TheDragon_.Description: If you have 5 or more stacks of Adaptation when you perform a Centurion reaction, lose 1 stack of Adaptation and emulate the effects of Dragon's Blaze.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Form_TheGryphon_.Description: Centurion reactions may be performed when an enemy you can see misses you.

ACT_Ward_Ascension_Form_TheGryphon_Node_.Description: After you have suffered total damage exceeding 70% of your maximum Vitality (-1% per Constitution over 10, minimum of 20%), activate Ward for 1 turn.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Form_TheGryphon_.Description: Centurion reactions may be performed when you perform an attack of Opportunity.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Form_TheGryphon.Description: When you perform a Centurion reaction, gain 2 stacks of Adaptation.
Centurion reactions gain +10% critical strike chance per stack of Adaptation.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Form_TheGryphon_Node.Description: When you activate Ward, activate Adaptation gaining 2 stacks.

ACT_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_Wealth_Node_.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Abeyance.

-5% damage from Abeyance (-1% per Form and Inertia), up to -45%.

+2% to all Resistances.

ACT_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_Wealth_Nod.Description:
Learn the Adaptation skill.

Adaptation activates, granting 3 stacks, when you perform Flurry.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_Wealth_Node.Description:
When you activate Abeyance, if you control three or more totems, sacrifice your oldest totem to reduce the damage that you would suffer from Abeyance by 40%.

+2% to all Resistances.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_Wealth_No.Description: If you have 5 or more stacks of Adaptation when you cast Fortify or Peace of Mind, lose 5 stacks of Adaptation and extend that target's Source Generation by 1 turn.
If you have 8 or more stacks of Adaptation when you cast Meteor Shower, lose 5 stacks of Adaptation and gain +1 effective Source Infusion level for this cast.

ACT_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_Cerberus_N.Description: When you cast Cannibalize, activate Adaptation gaining 5 stacks, or 10 for a controllable summon.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Form_Cerberus_Node_2.Description: If you have 2 weapons equipped, Ward grants +30% damage per totem you control at the time of activation, up to +120%.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_Cerberus_.Description: Adaptation grants: +1 Initiative, +0.1 movement, and +3.5% Constitution.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Form_Cerberus_Node_3.Description: When you activate Ward due to interaction with an enemy, summon a Boneshaped Skitterer adjacent to them.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Form_Cerberus_.Description: When you activate Adaptation, also activate it for allied heroes, using your Adaptation effects.
When you activate Adaptation, also activate it for your summons, using your Adaptation effects.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Form_Cerberus_Node_4.Description: Ward lasts 1 more turn and grants +25% Finesse, Power, and Wits.

MUTA_Presence_Ascension_Form_TheRitual_N.Description: Presence grants +1% Critical Chance per Leadership.

ACT_Occultist_Ascension_Form_TheRitual_N.Description: Occultist activates when you perform a ritual reaction targeting an enemy.

MUTA_Wither_Ascension_Form_TheRitual_Nod.Description: If you have a two handed weapon equipped, Withered applies -10% Dodge (-1.5% per Form and Entropy ).
Withered applies -20% Wits (-2% per Form, Inertia, and Entropy).

MUTA_Occultist_Ascension_Form_TheRitual_.Description: Once per turn, when you perform an Occultist reaction on an enemy, your totems attempt to attack it.

ACT_Wither_Ascension_Form_TheRitual_Node.Description: Source Infusion 1: When you cast Cannibalize on a controllable summon that is within 6m of 3 of your own totems, sacrifice those totems and apply Withered for 2 turns to all enemies in combat with you. Then, gain +50% damage while you emulate the effects of Finger of Death on all enemies you can see. Recover 1 SP.

ACT_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_Sphinx_Node_.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Abeyance.

While you have Abeyance, gain +1 AP Recovery.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Form_Sphinx_Nod.Description: Once per round, if you have a free offhand when you perform a Centurion reaction, emulate the effects of Silencing Stare.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_Sphinx_Node.Description: When you activate Abeyance, if your abeyed damage exceeds 40% of your maximum Vitality, lose all stacks of Adaptation to reduce your abeyed damage by 10% per stack lost.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Form_Sphinx_Nod.Description: When you perform a Centurion reaction, gain 2 stacks of Adaptation. If you already have this effect: gain one more stack.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Form_Sphinx_Node.Description: Damage from Abeyance cannot reduce your Vitality below 5%.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Form_Sphinx_Nod.Description: If you have 4 or more stacks of Adaptation when you perform a Centurion reaction, lose 3 stacks of Adaptation, and emulate the effects of Chain Lightning.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Inertia_TheArmadi.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants +2% Increased Battered and Harried Threshold.

+3% Earth Resistance.

MUTA_Presence_Ascension_Inertia_TheAuroc.Description: Presence grants +2% to elemental resistances per Leadership. If you already have this effect: Presence grants +1% physical resistance per Leadership.

ACT_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_TheCra.Description: Learn the Mercy skill, which activates Benevolence on allies around you.

ACT_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_TheCrab_Node_.Description: After you have suffered total damage exceeding 70% of your maximum Vitality (-1% per Constitution over 10, minimum of 20%), activate Ward for 1 turn.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_TheCr.Description: When you remove 4 or more stacks of Battered and or Harried via Benevolence, extend your Source Generation by 1 turn.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_TheCrab_Node.Description: Ward grants: +3% Increased Battered and Harried Threshold.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_TheGuard.Description: Celestial reactions can be performed on allies you can see when a friendly effect removes Battered or Harried from them.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheGuard.Description: Centurion reactions can be performed when an enemy you can see within weapon range (up to 5m away) hits a non-self ally with a basic attack or spell.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_TheGuar.Description: Celestial reactions cleanse Acid, Bleeding, Brittle, Poisoned (if not undead), Suffocating from allies.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheGuar.Description: Centurion reactions apply Taunted for 1 turn.

MUTA_Presence_Ascension_Inertia_TheCasqu.Description: Presence grants +1% missing Physical and Magic Armor regeneration per Leadership.

ACT_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_TheCas.Description:
Learn the Mercy skill, which activates Benevolence on allies around you.

If you have a free off hand, when an ally activates Paucity or Purity, activate Benevolence, removing +1 Battered and Harried.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_TheCasqu.Description: Perform Celestial on allies you can see when a friendly effect removes Battered or Harried from them.
Perform Celestial on allies you can see when they reach 3 stacks or more of Elementalist, once per ally per round.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_TheCa.Description: Once per round, when you remove three or more stacks of Battered or Harried with Benevolence, gain a exceptional amount of base Physical and Magical Armor (based on character level) for 2 turns.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_TheCasq.Description: Once per round, duplicate the effect of your Celestial reaction on yourself.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheCent.Description: Once per turn, Centurion reactions performed while Defiance is active afflict the target with 1 additional stack of Battered and Harried.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheCentu.Description: Centurion reactions can be performed when an enemy you can see within weapon range (up to 5m away) hits a non-self ally with a basic attack or spell.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_TheCent.Description: When you perform your third Celestial and/or Centurion reaction in a single round, activate Ward and extend Source Generation by 1 turn.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheCentu.Description: Centurion reactions can be performed when your Ward is caused to activate due to an enemy.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheCent.Description: Source Infusion 1: when you perform a Centurion reaction, apply Ruptured Tendons for 1 turn to enemies you hit.
When you perform a Centurion reaction, activate Violent Strike and gain +20% damage (+3% per invested Strength) during the reaction.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_TheCenturion.Description: Your Ward grants Volatile Armor: 15% of Armor damage taken is dealt to others within 2m as physical damage.

ACT_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_TheGla.Description:
Learn the Mercy skill, which activates Benevolence on allies around you.

Once per round, when you reach 10 or more stacks of Adaptation, emulate the effects of Mercy.

+2% to Elemental Resistances.

MUTA_Adaptation_Ascension_Inertia_TheGla.Description:
Learn the Mercy skill, which activates Benevolence on allies around you.

Once per round, when you reach 10 or more stacks of Adaptation, emulate the effects of Mercy.

+2% to Elemental Resistances.

ACT_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_TheGladiator_.Description: After you have suffered total damage exceeding 70% of your maximum Vitality (-1% per Constitution over 10, minimum of 20%), activate Ward for 1 turn.
Once per turn, when you have two weapons equipped and an attack misses you, activate Ward for 1 turn.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_TheGl.Description: Benevolence applies 2 stacks of Adaptation to allies it affects.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_TheGladiator.Description: When you activate Ward, restore 5% of your total Vitality and remove 1 stack of Battered or Harried, whichever is higher.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheGlad.Description: If you have Ward, Centurion reactions restore 20% of your missing Physical and Magical Armor, and gain +0.75% damage per percent of your current Physical and Magical Armor.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_TheHippo.Description: Once per round per ally, Celestial reactions can be performed on allies you can see that perform a critical strike, if they are missing Vitality.

ACT_Prosperity_Ascension_Inertia_TheHipp.Description: Once per round, activate Prosperity for 1 turn when you activate Ward, regardless of your Vitality.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_TheHipp.Description: Celestial reactions also restore 15% of target's missing Physical and Magical Armor (+2% per Inertia).
Celestial reactions activate Violent Strike for allies.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Inertia_TheHip.Description: Prosperity grants +10% physical and piercing resistance.

ACT_Abeyance_Ascension_Inertia_TheRhinoc.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Abeyance.

Abeyance damages your Physical Armor, then Magical Armor, and then Vitality.

+5% Physical Resistance.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheRhino.Description: Centurion reactions can be performed when an enemy you can see applies a tier II or III status to you or an ally.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Inertia_TheRhinoc.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants +25% damage. +1 Defiance duration.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Inertia_TheRhino.Description: Twice per round, if you have a shield equipped when Abeyance activates, emulate the effects of Shields Up.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheRhin.Description: Once per round, your Centurion reaction emulates the effects of Battle Stomp instead of performing a basic attack. If normally less than 10m, Centurion's range becomes 10m for this reaction.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Inertia_TheArena_.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants +10% Dodge and +2% Increased Battered and Harried Threshold.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheArena.Description: If you have Defiance at the end of your turn, perform a Centurion reaction on the nearest enemy you can see.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Inertia_TheAre.Description: If you have two weapons equipped, Prosperity grants +10% Accuracy and +20% Critical Chance.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Inertia_TheAren.Description: Centurion reactions apply up to tier II of Ataxia and Squelched for 1 turn.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Inertia_TheAre.Description: If you have Prosperity, your Source Infusions apply at +1 effective infusion for Aspect of the Bull and Heart of Steel; these statuses now grant +10% Finesse and Wits.
While you have Prosperity, gain an Empowered Bouncing Shield skill that costs 2AP and has a 1 turn cooldown.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_Champion.Description: Celestial reactions can be performed on enemies as they become afflicted with Vulnerable III.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_Champion_Nod.Description: Once per round when you activate Ward, apply Encouraged for 3 turns to yourself and allies within 13m, and remove 1 Battered and Harried from them.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_Champio.Description: Once per round, Celestial reactions performed on enemies emulate the effects of Pressure Spike and Winter Blast.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_Champion_Nod.Description: Ward grants +3% to elemental maximum resistances and +7% to physical and piercing resistance.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Inertia_Champio.Description: Celestial reactions apply your Ward to allies and restore 1 AP.

MUTA_Ward_Ascension_Inertia_Champion_Nod.Description: Ward grants +1% to all resistances (per Form, Inertia, and Life).

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Inertia_Fortress_.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants an additional 1 AP from Prepared; if you have 7 stacks of Battered or Harried (combined), gain an additional +1 AP, or +2 AP with 12 stacks.

ACT_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_Fortre.Description: Once per turn, activate Benevolence when an ally is damaged to 0 Physical or Magical Armor.

MUTA_Presence_Ascension_Inertia_Fortress.Description: Presence grants +0.15% increased Battered and Harried Threshold per Leadership.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Inertia_Fortress.Description: The first time you activate Abeyance each combat, gain Comeback Kid for 5 turns.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_Fortr.Description: Benevolence Restores 5% of your missing Physical or Magical Armor per stack of Battered or Harried removed, respectively.

MUTA_Abeyance_Ascension_Inertia_Fortress.Description: When you perform Shields Up, allies within 5m of you gain Abeyance for 1 turn. When an ally would suffer damage from Abeyance, you suffer it instead. Reduce damage suffered from Abeyance by 3.5% per Inertia, up to -45%.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Inertia_Fortr.Description: Once source generation begins, it continues until the end of combat. When you remove 4 or more stacks of Battered or Harried from Benevolence, gain Stockpile for 5 turns: recover 1 Source Point the next time you spend Source.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Life_TheBeetle_No.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants a moderate amount of base Physical and Magic Armor (based on character level).

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheHind_Nod.Description: Celestial reactions can be performed on allies you can see with less than 50% Vitality when they spend Source.

ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_TheHind_.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally targets an enemy or point you can see with an Aerothurge or Hydrosophist skill. The reaction deals air or water damage, respectively.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheHind_No.Description: Once per round per ally, Celestial reactions extend the target's Source Generation by 1 turn.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_TheHind.Description: Air and water Elementalist reactions apply Charged and Brittle for 2 turns, respectively.

MUTA_Presence_Ascension_Life_TheLizard_N.Description: Presence grants +2% to elemental resistances per Leadership. If you already have this effect: Presence grants +1% missing Vitality regeneration per Leadership.

ACT_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_TheRabbit_.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Prosperity.

Prosperity grants +1 Leadership.

+1 Constitution.

ACT_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheRabbit_Node.Description: When reduced to 30% Vitality (+1.5% per Life) or below, activate Purity.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_TheRabbit.Description: Prosperity grants +1 duration for Mend Metal, Restoration, and Soothing Cold you apply. These statuses grant +5 to elemental resistances.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheRabbit_Nod.Description: Purity aura grants +2.5% Battered and Harried threshold.

ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_TheEncha.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally performs a Centurion reaction or applies Weakened III. The reaction deals air or water damage, respectively.

ACT_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_TheEnchant.Description: If you already have 3 stacks of Elementalist or more when you perform an Elementalist reaction, activate Prosperity for 1 turn, regardless of your Vitality.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheEnchantres.Description: When you activate Purity, lose 4 stacks of Elementalist.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_TheEnch.Description: Gain +2% to all resistances and +2% critical chance per stack of Elementalist.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_TheEnchan.Description: If you have Prosperity, your Source Infusions apply at +1 effective infusion for Aerosphere, Armor of Frost, and Lightning Bolt.

ACT_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_TheHuntres.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Prosperity.

Source Infusion 1: When you perform Flurry, activate Prosperity for 2 turns, regardless of your Vitality.

ACT_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheHuntress_No.Description:
When reduced to 30% Vitality (+1.5% per Life) or below, activate Purity.

Once per turn, activate Purity when you lose Prosperity.

+4% Dodge Chance.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_TheHuntre.Description: Prosperity grants +1 duration to Farseer, Peace of Mind, and Haste; these statuses now grant +5% accuracy and +7% critical chance.
If you have Prosperity, your Source Infusions apply at +1 effective infusion for Elemental Arrowheads, First Aid, and Marksman's Fang.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheHuntress_N.Description: Once per round, if Purity would activate but has remaining cooldown, reduce its remaining cooldown by 1.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheNymph_No.Description: Celestial reactions can be performed when an ally activates Purity or Paucity, and does not have full Vitality.

ACT_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheNymph_Node_.Description: When reduced to 30% Vitality (+1.5% per Life) or below, activate Purity.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheNymph_Node.Description: Your Celestial reactions reduce your Purity's remaining cooldown by 1.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheNymph_N.Description: Source Infusion 1: your next Celestial reaction grants 1 Source Point. Source Infusion 2: in combat round 3 or later, your next Celestial reaction grants 2 Source Points.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Life_TheNymph_Node.Description: Source Infusion 1: your next Purity activation emulates the effects of Spontaneous Combustion on enemies you can see within 10m.

ACT_Benevolence_Ascension_Life_Pegasus_N.Description:
Learn the Mercy skill, which activates Benevolence on allies around you.

If you have a free off hand, activate Benevolence when an ally activates Purity or Paucity.

+2% to all Resistances.

ACT_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_Pegasus_.Description: Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally targets an enemy or point you can see with an Aerothurge or Hydrosophist skill. The reaction deals air or water damage, respectively.
Elementalist reactions can be performed when an ally targets an enemy or point you can see with a Huntsman or Warfare skill. The reaction deals earth or fire damage, respectively.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Life_Pegasus_.Description: Benevolence restores 15% of missing Vitality and grants +5% elemental resistances for 1 turn, to each target.
When you remove 3 stacks of Battered and/or Harried with Benevolence, activate Purity, or if it is on cooldown, reduce its remaining cooldown by 1.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_Pegasus.Description: When an ally performs a Celestial reaction on you, lose 1 stack of Elementalist.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheStag_Nod.Description: Celestial reactions can be performed on allies you can see with less than 50% Vitality when they spend Source. If you already have this activator: the target no longer needs to be below 50% Vitality.

ACT_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Life_TheStag.Description: Activate Violent Strike when you remove a stack of Battered or Harried from an ally.

ACT_Defiance_Ascension_Life_TheStag_Node.Description:
Unlock basic activation of Defiance.

Defiance grants +7% to elemental resistances.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheStag_No.Description: Celestial reactions apply Haste for 1 turn.
Celestial reactions apply Magic Shell for 2 turns.

MUTA_ViolentStrike_Ascension_Life_TheSta.Description: If you are affected by Purity, once per round when you perform a Violent Strike, emulate the effects of Glaciate and Ignition.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheGoddess_.Description: Celestial reactions can be performed when an ally activates Ward, if they are missing Vitality.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheGoddess.Description: Celestial reactions also restore 2% of maximum Physical and Magical armor per Life.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Life_TheGodde.Description: Benevolence emulates the Vitality restoration of your Celestial reaction.

MUTA_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheGoddess.Description: Celestial reactions on allies remove 2 Battered or Harried, whichever is higher.

MUTA_Benevolence_Ascension_Life_TheGodde.Description: You no longer suffer stacks of Battered or Harried from Benevolence.

ACT_Celestial_Ascension_Life_TheGoddess_.Description: Source Infusion 1: Celestial reactions can be performed when an allied character dies, resurrecting the fallen character with 50% Vitality at your position. You suffer 7 stacks of Battered and Harried.

ACT_Purity_Ascension_Life_Hope_Node_2_0.Description: Activate Purity when you perform Shields Up.

MUTA_Centurion_Ascension_Life_Hope_Node_.Description: Once per turn, If you have two weapons equipped while performing a Centurion reaction, gain +100% Critical Chance during the reaction.
If you are affected by Purity, Centurion reactions gain +6% damage per Force, Inertia, and Life.
Source Infusion 1: when you perform a Centurion reaction, emulate the effects of Supernova.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Life_Hope_Node_3_2.Description: When you activate Purity, gain Blinding Radiance for 2 turns. -1 turn Purity cooldown.

ACT_Centurion_Ascension_Life_Hope_Node_4.Description: When an ally activates Abeyance, Paucity, or Purity in response to an enemy you can see, activate Violent Strike, teleport to that enemy, and attempt to perform a Centurion reaction on it.

MUTA_Purity_Ascension_Life_Hope_Node_4_1.Description: If you have Purity active, your Aerothurge and Pyrokinetic skills remove it to perform at +1 effective Source Infusion.

ACT_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_Splendor_N.Description: Activate Prosperity for 1 turn when you activate Purity, regardless of your Vitality.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_Splendo.Description: Elementalist reactions gain +1m radius and no longer damage allies.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_Splendor_.Description: When you cast Ignition, emulate its effects. If you have Prosperity when you apply Scorched to an enemy, also apply Charged for 1 turn.

MUTA_Elementalist_Ascension_Life_Splendo.Description: If you have Prosperity and 4 or more stacks of Elementalist when you perform an Elementalist reaction, deal its damage again to all enemies within 13m of your target.

MUTA_Prosperity_Ascension_Life_Splendor_.Description: Prosperity grants an Empowered Ignition spell that costs 2 AP and has a 1 turn cooldown.
Once per round, when you perform 3 or more reactions in one round, gain 1 SP if you have Prosperity.
